name: Elusive Thief (vishwah13)
description:
Note: Linux and mac builds are not tested but WebGl and Windows builds works fine.

This game is made for Godot Wild Jam #33

Here your are a thief trying to steal jewellery from heavily guard place and try to escape form the authorities.

WASD and Arrow keys for movement 

E to interact and steal

R to Restart the level

Attributes:

Art: Made By https://tilation.itch.io/

Music: By Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/

SFX : Made By me using ChipTone

Game Engine : Godot

Entier project has been uploaded to Github so that anyone can learn and this is the first game i made using Godot so please don't expect a perfect code.

https://github.com/vishwah13/Elusive_Thief
